card.name: Balga Raiser, the Dragonic Meteor
card.text: ■ Speed Attacker ■ Double Breaker ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a non-evolution Dragon, you may put it into the battle zone.

card.name: Spell Del Fin, Light Divine Dragon
card.text: ■ Your opponent plays with their hand Face Up ■ This creature gets +2000 power for each spell in your opponent's hand. ■ Your opponent can't cast spells. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Ryusei Kaiser, the Eternal
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ Each of your creatures gets "speed attacker". ■ Your opponent's creatures are put tapped. ■ When this creature would be discarded by the effect of one of your opponent's spells or ability of an opponent's creature, you may put it instead.

card.name: Onimaru "Head", Victory Rush
card.text: ■ Speed Attacker ■ Power Attacker ■ Triple Breaker ■ Gachinko Judge 2

card.name: Mendelssohn
card.text: ■ Reveal the top 2 cards of your deck. Put all Dragons revealed this way into your mana zone tapped and the rest into your graveyard.

card.name: Meteorite Ryusei the Flash
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, tap all your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. ■ Each of your creatures in the battle zone gets "speed attacker". ''(A creature that has "speed attacker doesn't get summoning sickness.)''

card.name: Wald Brachio, Absolute World King
card.text: ■ World Breaker ■ Whenever your opponent puts a creature and that ability would trigger, that ability won't trigger instead. ''(For example, your opponent can't use an ability that starts with "When you put this creature".)''

card.name: Batocross Battle, Passion Dragon
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. This creature and that creature battle. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone during your opponent's turn, put this creature on the bottom of your deck at the End Step

card.name: Koltiolu, Scale Dragon Elemental
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, for each of your Dragons in the battle zone, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it.

card.name: Digorpion, Ground Digging Snakekind
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, if you have another Dragon in the battle zone, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. If you don't have another Dragon in the battle zone, put this creature into your mana zone.

card.name: Mega Blade Dragon
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy all your opponent's creatures that have "blocker".

card.name: Blue Dragon Earth
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Choose a non-evolution creature in your mana zone that costs less than the number of cards in your mana zone and put it into the battle zone. If it's a fire or nature creature, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures. Those 2 creatures battle.

card.name: Top of Romanesk
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Blocker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put the top 2 cards of your deck into your mana zone tapped.

card.name: Teranesk, Hard Battling Ancient Dragon
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. From among them, put any number of creatures into your hand and put the rest into your mana zone tapped.

card.name: Balga Do Raiba, Matchless Dragon Phantom
card.text: ■ Speed Attacker ■ Mach Fighter ■ Triple Breaker ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a Dragon, put it into the battle zone. Otherwise, put it into your mana zone.

card.name: Aegis Boost, Matchless Dragon Saint
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Blocker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.
